metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 14.1, an improper accesscontrol vulnerability allows users with expired password to still accessGitLab through git and API through access tokens acquired before passwordexpiration.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
